title: Hard Rock Hotel construction project collapses in New Orleans
text:
A construction project turned into a disaster when the top floors of a Hard Rock Casino hotel in New Orleans collapsed, according to Nola.com.

Video taken by a viewer and sent to WWL-TV shows the devastation from the top floors.

Continue Reading Below

New Orleans EMS tells the local publication at least three people were injured in the incident and taken to the hospital for treatment.

The Canal Street construction of the hotel in downtown New Orleans was announced in February 2018. It was slated to open in the spring of 2020.

This is a breaking news story and will be updated.
description: The top floors of the building, still under construction, collapsed Saturday morning.
